scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build:render: npm install && cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate && cd ../client && npm install --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.start:render: cd server && npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && node scripts/create-session-table.js && node scripts/init-platform.js && npm start
scripts.db:push: cd server && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
